## Example {.smaller}

$$\int \frac{2 x^{3} + 8 x^2 + 5x}{x^{4} + 3 x^{3} + 2 x^{2} - 2 x - 4}\;dx = 
\int\frac{1}{x-1}\;dx - \int\frac{1}{x+2}\;dx + \int\frac{2x + 3}{x^2 + 2x + 2}\;dx$$

## Continued {.smaller}

$$\int\frac{1}{x^2 + 2x + 2}\;dx$$

$$\int \frac{5x + 3}{3x^2 - 2x + 1}\;dx$$
